title: So.... WHEN ARE WE GETTING DAM DOMINION!?
body:
I have been waiting for fucking ever on OCE just to have dominion. PLEASE just for a week? like you do with Twisted Tree line?

I miss this game type so much and just because I want to play without lag, you take game modes away from us?

replies.body: So here's an idea, we fuck off that shitty fucking game mode called ARAM (Absolute fucking trash) and replace it with Dom. (A fun game type, that isn't 100% street shit)

You know what we need, so get that hips going with your gf then in a decade's time you shall receive Dominion rewarded to you if you have worked hard enough.

Spread the word.
We will get in when Australias population increases to the point where we have enough LoL players to support it, so get fornicating ;)
it would cost riot money and they don't want to waste some of their billions of dollars on a cheap server
